attributes.action: Under age youths have to Pay back to Society NO MORE SLAPPED WRISTS
attributes.additional_details: All underage children should have to face up to their responsibility for their actions of un lawfulness to their society.  Where they commit a crime they have to pay back to Society. . . .community service in Litter picking, cleaning up and creating of nature reserve, working with the homeless etc.  Community interacting than Games and computer communication.
